articles.title: Republicans Secure Senate Majority as Casey Concedes
articles.description: Democratic Senator Bob Casey conceded the Pennsylvania Senate race to Republican Dave McCormick, expanding the Republican majority in the Senate. The Republicans will hold 53 seats, enabling them to confirm Trump's appointments, though short of the votes needed to advance most legislation swiftly.
